short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wondered what proportion of websites you visit are HTTP vs. HTTPS?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get a snapshot view of what proportion of websites you visit are HTTP vs. HTTPS. 

To use, simply click the green lock extension icon to the right of the address bar. 

Every website is counted uniquely, i.e. if you visit https://facebook.com twice, it will only be counted once. 

GitHub link: https://github.com/ShivanKaul/http-vs-https
